name: Nutella® Buttercream Frosting
author: Vanessa Correia
summary: Delicious buttercream frosting flavored with Nutella®.
ingredients: ¾ cup unsalted butter, at room temperature
¾ cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®)
directions: Combine butter and chocolate-hazelnut spread in a bowl and beat with an electric mixer on medium-high speed until creamy, about 2 minutes
Reduce speed on mixer to medium
Gradually add confectioners' sugar, 1/2 cup at a time, beating well after each addition and scraping down sides of the bowl as needed
After every 1 cup of confectioners' sugar, raise the speed of the mixer up to high and beat for 10 to 20 seconds
Add cream, hazelnut extract, vanilla extract, and salt
